13 Results for your search "Dalilah"

What does Murshid offer?

The program takes its name from the Arabic word “dalila,” which has its origins in Qatari and Gulf culture and describes a person who has an innate understanding of terrain and routes and the ability to lead others to their destinations, whether on land or sea.

Our success story

The Delilah program aims to empower young people in Qatar to make informed career decisions and help them plan their career paths in line with their interests, abilities, and ambitions

What does Murshid offer?

The program takes its name from the Arabic word “dalila,” which has its origins in Qatari and Gulf culture and describes a person who has an innate understanding of terrain and routes and the ability to lead others to their destinations, whether on land or sea.
